description: Anglish Wordbook is an app to help you find the Germanic English substitute for a word with a foreign root.
privacy: The only data we collect is your email address.  The email address is used to reset your password in case you forget it. No other data is collected. Your email will not be shared or sold or anything like that.  It will sit in a secure database until you go to reset your password and then it will be used for that process.
